text: allah anumatikkata etaiyum avarkalukku markkamakki vaikkakkutiya teyvankalum avarkalukku irukkinranava? (Ovvoru ceyalukkum takka) kuli kotuppatu marumaiyiltan enru iraivanutaiya tirmanam erpattirukkavitil, (ituvarai) avarkalutaiya kariyam mutivu perreyirukkum. Niccayamaka (ittakaiya) aniyayakkararkalukku mikka tunpuruttum vetanai untu
